items.sentence: Tom, Mary and John spent Saturday practicing for the talent show.
Tom\'s parents only stayed together for the sake of the children.
When I fell off my bicycle, I couldn\'t get up for a few minutes.
Tom said that he\'d give me thirty dollars if I ate an earthworm.
Tom will go to the supermarket for you and buy whatever you need.
I don\'t think I\'ll be able to make myself understood in French.
I don\'t think there\'s any chance that Tom will let you do that.
Mary isn\'t only prettier, but she gets better grades than Alice.
I wonder whether Tom has ever asked Mary why she didn\'t do that?
I wonder why they didn\'t make Tom do what he was supposed to do.
Would you ever eat live maggots? What about if I gave you $1,000?
Tom said he was planning on visiting an old girlfriend in Boston.
My only complaint is that where I work isn\'t closer to my house.
Were Tom and Mary speaking French, or were they speaking English?
What do you think is the best way to encourage Tom to study more?
If I\'d had enough money, I would\'ve gone to Australia with Tom.
Tom gave me a nice set of aluminum wheels, but he kept the tires.
Tom grabbed the gun away from Mary before she could kill herself.
Tom told Mary that he thought she shouldn\'t go there by herself.
I don\'t know where Tom is planning to spend his summer vacation.
